resources.string: To encourage Malaysians, regardless of ethnicity, gender or religion to stay healthy by walking and to help charitable organizations across the peninsular through the use of a singular, mobile application.
A healthier Malaysia where people are encouraged to walk and it\'s citizens are inspired to help those who are in need.
All proceeds from our sponsors will be donated 100% to charitable organizations throughout Malaysia.

Just by using this app and participating, you\'re already changing the lives of those in need across Malaysia. Want to do more? Contact the charitable organization of your liking and enquire for any voluntary positions!
